meanings.definition: The characteristic sound made by a horse.
meanings.sent1: The neigh of the horse echoed through the quiet barn.
meanings.sent2: I heard the neigh of a horse as I walked past the farm.
meanings.sent3: The neigh of the horse startled the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent4: The neigh of the horse was like music to my ears.
meanings.sent5: The loud neigh of the horse made me jump in surprise.

meanings.definition: To make the sound of a horse.
meanings.sent1: The horse will neigh when it sees its favorite treat.
meanings.sent2: I love to hear horses neigh in the fields.
meanings.sent3: I neighed back at the horse, trying to communicate.
meanings.sent4: The horse began to neigh loudly, signaling its excitement.
meanings.sent5: The horse neighed softly, creating a peaceful atmosphere.
